alert.note: Alert for Tift (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 05 at 4:48PM EDT until April 05 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR TIFT COUNTY... At 448 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Omega, or 7 miles southwest of Tifton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Phillipsburg around 455 PM EDT. Unionville around 500 PM EDT. Tifton around 505 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Vanceville, Tift Airport, Harding, Brookfield, Eldorado and Fender. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
